I decided to travel the world with my sister, Mary.
i am an avid fisherman.
I like to share my recipes with my friends and learn new ones from them.
and , my best friend is calden.

participant_2.background:
My recipe box is a collection of memories from my family.
I enjoy my own company and the challenge of archery.
My prized possession is my guitar, because it allows me to express my creativity and share my music with the world.
I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year.
i am learning to play the guitar.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
Hi, I'm just learning to play guitar.
That's awesome! I like to play guitar too. I'm self taught.
That's a good way to learn! I'm a big fan of rock music. What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but I really like playing rock music too.
That's awesome! I'm learning to play guitar so I can play in a band.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to play in a band.
Well, maybe we can start a band together!
What do you think? We could practice together and see if we have a good sound.
That sounds like a great idea
